search.title: Semiconductor device fabrication
search.snippet: Semiconductor device fabrication is the process used to manufacture semiconductor devices, typically integrated circuits (ICs) such as microprocessors

search.title: Virtual metrology
search.snippet: v t e In semiconductor manufacturing, virtual metrology refers to methods to predict the properties of a wafer based on machine parameters and sensor data

search.title: Nova Measuring Instruments
search.snippet: advanced metrology solutions for semiconductor manufacturing. Founded in 1993, the company specializes in dimensional, materials, and chemical metrology technologies
